resources.string: Speak not to me of blasphemy man! I\'d strike the sun if it insulted me

Congratulations! You\'ve now studied all 46 Hiragana. No small achievement! \n So, what next? You can continue to review the Hiragana here, until you feel completely comfortable with all of them. We would also recommeding that you check out some of the other great Japanese learning resources out there, so that you can start to see Hiragana in context, build your reading fluency and begin learning you first Japanese vocabulary! For more in-depth advice, why not visit the Information page!

Congratulations! You\'ve now studied all 46 Hiragana, and not only that you\'ve done it by the deadline you set yourself! Well done, that\'s no small achievement! \n So, what next? You can continue to review the Hiragana here, until you feel completely comfortable with all of them. We would also recommeding that you check out some of the other great Japanese learning resources out there. For more in-depth advice, why not visit the Information page!
Are you able to listen to audio?
Is this the only way you\'re studying?

Welcome to our Hiragana app! We look forward to learning with you. 

 Just before we begin, there's a few quick things we want to make you aware of…
\n While it is possible to complete the activities without audio, we would always recommend that you listen as you study, to better grasp the pronunciation of the different Hiragana.

\n We recommend using this app in conjunction with other Japanese learning apps. Since we\'re only covering Hiragana here, we would strongly advise using our app in conjunction with a broader Japanese learning app. That way, you\'ll be seeing Hiragana in complete words from the beginning!

While there are only 46 Hiragana, compared with thousands of Kanji, it is still important to note that it may take a couple of weeks of daily study before you've really got them hammered down. 

 Don't be afraid to focus on other areas of the language that you're struggling with now, and come back here when you're feeling ready!

With that out of the way, let's get started on learning! 

 Check out the info page if there's anything else you need help with. 

 がんばってね！
